1:
Listen to my call to you, Yahweh;\q think about my groanings.
\q
2:
Listen to the sound of my call, my King and my God,\q for it is to you that I pray.
\q
3:
Yahweh, in the morning you hear my cry;\q in the morning I will bring my petition to you and wait expectantly.


\q
4:
Certainly you are not a God who approves of evil;\q evil people will not be your guests.
\q
5:
The arrogant will not stand in your presence;\q you hate all who behave wickedly.
\q
6:
You will destroy liars;\q Yahweh despises violent and deceitful men.


\q
7:
But as for me, because of your great covenant faithfulness, I will come into your house;\q in reverence I will bow down toward your holy temple.
\q
8:
Oh Lord, lead me in your righteousness because of my enemies;\q make your path straight before me.


\q
10:
Declare them guilty, God;\q may their schemes be their downfall!
\q Drive them out for their many transgressions,
\q for they have rebelled against you.


\q
12: For you will bless the righteous, Yahweh;\q you will surround them with favor as with a shield.
